forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy and windy. High -2C. Winds E at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy and windy. Temps nearly steady around 30. Winds E at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with gusty winds developing after midnight. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low around -5C. Winds E at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and becoming windy. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low 26F. Winds E at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with gusty winds. A few flurries or snow showers possible. High -3C. Winds E at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy. A few flurries or snow showers possible. High 29F. Winds E at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy early...occasional snow showers. Areas of freezing rain possible. Low -7C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Quite windy early. Areas of freezing rain possible. Low 21F. Winds E at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early, with a steadier snow developing late in the day. High around -5C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early, with a steadier snow developing late in the day. High near 25F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow in the evening will transition to a wintry mix overnight. Low near -5C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow and ice accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow in the evening will transition to a wintry mix overnight. Low 24F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 100%. Snow and ice accumulating 5 to 8 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of rain and freezing rain early...changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 1C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 36F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 0C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 34F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 2C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will give way to lingering snow showers overnight. Low -1C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 33F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light freezing rain early...mixing with rain overnight. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
